name: Laser Rage (MGC_Vlad)
description:
Let's play a new twin-stick arcade shooter from video game Creator Andy and video game Developer Vlad called Laser Rage. It's futuristic. It has cool music. Play the game in the popular God Mode. Play it in Multiplayer Mode with your friends. Take on the Ultimate Challenge on 1 hit death. Go into a Laser rage and score 1 000 000 000 points or die!

Controls:
Player 1:
Keyboard:
WASD to move
arrows to aim
space to shoot
Gamepad:
left stick to move
right stick to aim and shoot

Player 2:

Gamepad:
left stick to move
right stick to aim and shoot
